missingFields.description: Ads.txt entries require three mandatory fields: domain, account ID, and relationship

invalidFormat.description: The ads.txt entry format is incorrect. Please use comma-separated format

invalidDomain.description: The specified domain '{{domain}}' is not a valid domain format

emptyAccountId.description: Account ID is a required field

emptyFile.description: The ads.txt file contains no content

invalidCharacters.description: The ads.txt file contains non-printable or control characters

noSellersJson.description: The specified advertising system does not have a sellers.json file

directAccountIdNotInSellersJson.message: DIRECT entry account ID '{{accountId}}' not found in sellers.json
directAccountIdNotInSellersJson.description: DIRECT relationship entries must have their account ID registered in the corresponding sellers.json file

resellerAccountIdNotInSellersJson.message: RESELLER entry account ID '{{accountId}}' not found in sellers.json
resellerAccountIdNotInSellersJson.description: RESELLER relationship entries must have their account ID registered in the corresponding sellers.json file

domainMismatch.description: The domain in sellers.json does not match the OWNERDOMAIN/MANAGERDOMAIN in ads.txt

directNotPublisher.description: DIRECT relationship entries should have seller_type as 'PUBLISHER' or 'BOTH' in sellers.json

sellerIdNotUnique.description: The same account ID is used in multiple entries

resellerNotIntermediary.description: RESELLER relationship entries should have seller_type as 'INTERMEDIARY' or 'BOTH' in sellers.json

implimentedEntry.description: Multiple ads.txt entries with the same content exist

noValidRecords.description: The uploaded file or provided data does not contain any valid ads.txt records

parsingError.description: An error occurred while parsing the file or data
